title: Lost rp on a skin boost for an ARAM
body: Someone dropped out in champ select as i clicked the boost button. I had 133 rp after i had 38 but the game didn't even start. How could it use my rp if the game did not even start? I also posted to help and support but have heard nothing for over a week now, this i second time this has happened.

replies.body:
The RP for the boost is meant to be taken out after the match actual begins (after champ select ends). I looked at your account and didn't see any charges for it, so I recommend going into the store and trying to purchase *anything*. You don't have to actually purchase something, but if you try to, it will force and RP balance update and should update with your proper balance. 

Let me know if this helped.

I don't understand this wasn't even about the rp, i have had this happen before i had 133 went to play an ARAM clicked the skin boost just as someone bailed. When i got back to the main launch application to play again i had 38 rp. And of course there wasn't any charges for it it's a glitch it just took it. I don't want the rp i want this fixed that's it i want nothing but that. Please someone needs to check this it is happening it is rare but it does happen.

Weeezing (Riot Games Player Support)
Aug 11, 09:54 PDT

Hello smeagledorf,

Weeezing here to assist you today on behalf of the Account Team! Thank you so much for writing in with your concerns. Sorry about the delay! I've checked our system and it appears that there was a slight glitch with your skin boost. Normally when skin boosts are queued the RP from the purchase isn't removed from an account until after the game has been played(which generally stops the charge is a person queue dodges after the boost purchase was made).

However, in your case it appears that you were charged even though someone dodged. Not to worry though as I've credited 95 RP to your account for this mistake. Enjoy!

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask!

Weeezing
Billing and Account Support
"You are all free now!"
